content.title: Choose
content.h3: Choose your SoT from your favorite location
content.p: SoTs are spread across the FingeRate Metaverse, around thousands of real-world locations. You can choose the location of your choice or simply  pick the popular ones!

content.title: Buy
content.h3: Get your first SoT through OpenSea SoT Collection
content.p: SoTs can only be owned by participating in auctions of NFT marketplace or buying from an SoT owner who puts it up for sale. More valuable an SoT is, more intense the competition is. Be quick to claim yours ASAP!

content.title: Earn
content.p: SoTs are not just ordinary virtual assets; it has the  efficacy of earning by its own. SoT terminals are used for conducting surveys in the FingeRate metaverse, and SoT owners get a percentage of the revenue generated by their SoTs. So, owning more SoTs means more passive income.

sot.p: SoTs (Satisfaction of Thing) are research & survey terminals in the FingeRate Metaverse which is mapped from the real-world. Each SoT is situated in every 300m~500m range and comes with a meeting room.
ol: Survey Requesters can set up surveys on the SoT terminals and allocate rewards for the participants.
Survey Participants within 300~500 meters radius of an SoT, can participate on the surveys shown on that SoT.
Survey Participants are rewarded in SoM (SoT Mileage) upon completion of the surveys, which can be used to upgrade avatars, buy items available in marketplace & many more.
